berlin
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  berlin.Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the state of the game. Contains all the information necessary for your AI to make the best moves.

Method Detail

addMove

public void addMove(Node from,
                    Node to,
                    int nbSoldiers)
Add a move to the list of moves you must populate on each turn. Attention: See the wiki for what is considered a valid move.

Parameters:
from - the starting node that contains your soldiers.
to - the ending node where you want to move your soldiers.
nbSoldiers - the number of soldiers you want to move.
